products.name: Curtains
products.description: Let your windows wear elegance with Sapta Curtains — the poetry your rooms have been waiting for. Flowing with grace in satin, jacquard, or delicate embroidery, our curtains transform ordinary spaces into soulful sanctuaries. Whether you're chasing golden sunlight or seeking privacy in style, these curtains are your home’s perfect frame. A soft flutter, a gentle fall — when you choose Sapta, you’re not just decorating… you’re storytelling.

products.name: Quilts
products.description: Design & Quality: ● Made with 100% soft cotton fabric for a smooth, gentle touch. ● Premium polyfill filling for lightweight warmth and extra fluffiness. ● Evenly stitched quilting patterns to keep filling in place, preventing lumps or cold spots. ● Hypoallergenic materials to ensure safe, irritation-free comfort for all skin types. Functional Features: ● Lightweight yet insulating for year-round usability. ● Breathable fabrics that prevent overheating during sleep. ● Durable construction for long-lasting use without sagging or flattening. ● Easy to fold and store when not in use. Style Options: ● Available in solid colors, subtle prints, and seasonal designs. ● Reversible quilts with two patterns in one for versatile styling. ● Matching pillow shams or cushion covers available in select sets. Care Instructions: ● Machine wash in cold water with mild detergent on gentle cycle. ● Tumble dry on low heat or air dry in shade. ● Avoid bleach to preserve fabric and filling quality. ● Light sun airing recommended for freshness. Perfect For: ● Daily bedroom comfort ● Layering with bed covers or blankets in colder months ● Guest room essentials ● Gifting for weddings, housewarmings, or festive occasions ● Travel and outdoor use during colder seasons

products.name: Cushions
products.description: A dash of charm, a sprinkle of color, and a whole lot of comfort — Sapta Cushions turn any space into a story. Whether you’re curling up with chai or entertaining guests, these cushions bring warmth, character, and a designer’s eye for detail to every room. With vibrant stripes and perfect puff, they're not just cushions — they're little islands of joy. Snuggle in and let your home wrap you in comfort.

products.name: Pillows
products.description: Every great day begins with a dreamy night — and it starts with the perfect pillow. Our Memory Foam Pillows cradle your neck in serene support, easing you into deep, uninterrupted slumber, while the elegant knitted fabric feels like a gentle caress. Prefer a fluffier feel? Our Conjugate Pillows are the hug your head has been waiting for — soft, supportive, and dressed in charming stripes. Lay down, let go, and drift into your dreams — with Sapta, even sleep feels luxurious.

products.name: Koramet Beds
products.description: Sink into timeless comfort with our Koramet Beds, where traditional charm meets modern elegance. The smart "Box" and "Book" styles unfold like stories — easy to store, stunning to display. Perfect for cozy corners or compact spaces, these beds are soft on your body, and even softer on your wallet. Whether you’re setting up your first home or upgrading your guest room, Koramet Beds wrap you in a calm, cushioned embrace you’ll never want to leave.

products.name: Travel Beds
products.description: Take the warmth of home wherever you go with our Sapta Travel Beds — your soft escape in a fast-moving world. Light as a breeze and gentle on your back, these beds fold into a cozy cocoon, perfect for impromptu journeys, visits to loved ones, or a dreamy nap under the stars. Crafted in breathable cotton and lively 3D textures, they invite you to pause, breathe, and relax —anytime, anywhere.Sapta’s travel beds are more than portable... they’re your pocket-sized paradise.

products.name: Foam Beds
products.description: Take the warmth of home wherever you go with our Sapta Travel Beds — your soft escape in a fast-moving world. Light as a breeze and gentle on your back, these beds fold into a cozy cocoon, perfect for impromptu journeys, visits to loved ones, or a dreamy nap under the stars. Crafted in breathable cotton and lively 3D textures, they invite you to pause, breathe, and relax — anytime, anywhere. Sapta’s travel beds are more than portable... they’re your pocket-sized paradise.

products.name: Aprons
products.description: Design & Quality: ● Crafted from premium cotton and polyester blends for a perfect balance of softness, durability, and ease of cleaning. ● Reinforced stitching at stress points ensures long-lasting wear, even with daily use. ● Designed for freedom of movement, so you can work without feeling restricted. Functional Features: ● Long waist ties for a custom fit across different body shapes and sizes. ● Deep front pockets to keep kitchen tools, recipe cards, gardening tools, or craft supplies within reach. ● Lightweight yet protective—keeps spills, splashes, and stains away from your clothes. Style Options: ● Available in solid colors, classic patterns, and modern prints to suit every personality and home décor style. ● Seasonal and festive designs for gifting or special occasions. ● Matching adult and kids’ aprons for family cooking or craft time. Care Instructions: ● Machine wash in cold water with mild detergent. ● Tumble dry on low heat or line dry for best results. ● Avoid using bleach to preserve color and fabric integrity. ● Iron on low if needed. Perfect For: ● Home kitchens and professional cooking ● Baking sessions with family or friends ● Gardening and outdoor BBQs ● Crafting, painting, and DIY projects ● Gifting for housewarmings, weddings, or festive occasions

products.name: Bed Covers
products.description: Design & Quality: ● Crafted from high-quality cotton, polyester blends, or jacquard fabrics for a luxurious feel and long-lasting durability. ● Soft, breathable materials to ensure comfort in all seasons. ● Meticulous stitching and precision finishing for a premium look. ● Colorfast fabrics that retain their vibrancy even after multiple washes. Functional Features: ● Lightweight yet durable construction for year-round comfort. ● Multi-purpose use – works as a protective cover or decorative layer like a bedsheet. ● Generous sizing to fully cover and protect the bed. ● Easy to fold and store when not in use. Care Instructions: ● Machine wash on gentle cycle with mild detergent. ● Tumble dry on low or line dry in shade. ● Avoid bleach to maintain fabric strength and color. ● Light ironing is recommended for a crisp finish. Perfect For: ● Daily bedroom use ● Guest rooms and hospitality setups
